short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download TikTok videos and Instagram content. Get content for your socialappfarm account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get Tiktok and Instagram content for your socialappfarm accounts. 

This extension adds a save button to images and videos on both instagram and tiktok. Clicking on the  save button will download and upload the content to your socialappfarm account. You can now re-use the content on your accounts.

Extension works by trying to download non-watermarked video to the memory before uploading to your socialappfarm account, if it fails to download to memory then it may need to download to your file system before uploading the content.  Also if it fails to get a non-watermarked content then it downloads and uploads a watermarked video to socialappfarm especially for tiktok.

Note extension may break because tiktok and instagram may update their website anytime but we will fix as soon as possible once we are aware.
